name: Programming Clicker
description:
Hello there, this is our second game. This time it ready to play!

Proggraming  Clicker is game in which you need to type codes, upgrade your click power and buy programmer which auto type codes, and do rebirths! For Rebirths you can equip new skins, to complete the game you need to do 10 rebirths!

This game is for android, next game will be soon!

And remember: We are Trying For You :)
